Subject: Create an KPI Report of one Domain
Description:
We got the requirement by our CEO to provide a KPI report, without to much technical data. 

Unfortunately I did not see an option to create such an report for a single Domain.
Can you please help me on this topic?

Currently we have to do screenshots and have a lot of manual work.
Solution_Comment__c: Request to add a new custom report. Feature request added:  https://community.netwrix.com/t/create-a-kpi-report-of-one-domain/14164
